meanings.definition: Involving or relating to biological hazards.
meanings.sent1: The scientists wore special suits to handle the biohazardous materials safely.
meanings.sent2: The biohazardous waste needed to be disposed of properly to protect everyone.
meanings.sent3: The biohazardous sign on the door made the room seem like a mysterious place.
meanings.sent4: The biohazardous nature of the situation made everyone cautious.
meanings.sent5: The bright red label warned of the biohazardous contents inside.

meanings.definition: A substance or situation that poses a risk to human health or the environment due to biological factors.
meanings.sent1: The workers were trained to handle biohazardous materials with care.
meanings.sent2: The spill was quickly contained to prevent any biohazardous exposure.
meanings.sent3: The biohazardous waste bin was always kept securely locked.
meanings.sent4: The biohazardous area was marked off with caution tape.
meanings.sent5: The biohazardous substance was safely transported in a sealed container.
